d1: The title of the chart is 'Share of US Coffee Drinkers by Frequency of Coffee Consumption'.
d2: The chart is composed of a pie chart with each color representing the frequency of coffee consumption, and the theta indicating the percentage of the US coffee drinkers.

insight2.insightSentence: On average, 20% of US coffee drinkers consume coffee.

subInsights.phrases: On average, 20% of US coffee drinkers consume coffee.

insight1.insightSentence: The majority of US coffee drinkers consume coffee several times per week (24%) or less often (25%), while the minority consume it never (13%) or daily (20%).

subInsights.phrases: The majority of US coffee drinkers consume coffee several times per week (24%)
while the minority consume it never (13%)
